Blog.post: I'm sure I have stuff to say, but I don't seem to have the discipline to post it! So here we go ... nada, once more! But, DO read this blog I stumbled upon ... WAY COOL! . urlLink http://not-your-girl.net/girl.php Have a great weekend!

Ok, maybe this will be my theme for a while ... firsts. Or maybe not, but this is what I have to share this Friday. When taking the S Train (aka The Shuttle ), watch out for Track #4. You'll want to be sure to run toward the lead car (that is, the one at the every front). Not only will you beat the rush out at Times Square, you'll avoid the narrow exit-way the folks in the rear cars have to deal with! As well, whether it's raining or not - there seems to be a big puddle on that end! So there you have it. I've gone from Outlook TIPS to Commuter TIPS! Have a great weekend ...
Ok, blog #1 ... I like the name, SandeeBlog. Geez, Monday I had plenty to 'blog' about. Today? Nada. Later ...
... it's such a pretty car - someone should really buy it. We did. Here are the details - really, buy this car, you'll love it! We did. urlLink details
"It is never too late to have a happy childhood" ~ Tom Robbins I did a quick Google and found he's got a lot of good quotes out here, urlLink take a look . ... have a nice day friends!

Jordan Mae Higgins - what a nice name. I wonder if I'm the FIRST to post it on the INTERNET! My friend and former co-worker just made the announcement ... congratulation to Steve and his wife, Mrs. Steve! Born July 19th - that makes little Jordan a Leo I think ... also interesting, JMH shares this day with some famous (and infamous) folks ... Lizzie Borden (alleged murderess) and Edgar Degas (artist). Very cool ... :) Over and out for now!
Well, I've been spending some quality time on populating my new urlLink Photo Gallery ... it's been WAY easier than actually thinking of something to "say" on this silly BLOG!
